doc.title: Ask Jack!
doc.plot: Ask Jack! chronicles the fascinating rag to riches life of Jack Morton. The son of a tenet farmer, Jack was know as a fearless and warm-hearted entrepreneur who pioneered a new era in corporate entertainment. He worked with many, and discovered a few, of the greatest entertainers in the world including Bob Hope, Jack Benny, Bill Cosby, Bob Newhart, Carol Burnett, George Burns, Tony Bennett, and many others. Today Jack Morton Worldwide is a global leader in experiential marketing with more than 600 employees throughout the US, Europe, and Asia-Pacific - a far cry from the one-man operation Jack founded in 1939 in Washington, D.C.
